name: Glitsa
description:
Glitsa is a first-person shooter set in 1960s Crete inspired by Dusk and other games of the boomer shooter genre. 

The protagonist is a former cultist going back to his village to get his revenge by killing the arch-priest for sacrificing his mother when he was a child.

Cultists, strange beings, possessed villagers, and satanic creatures stand in your way along with labyrinthine architecture and locked doors as you advance further into the village.

Use your wits, your guns and your glitsa (= shepherd's crook) to exact justice and rid the island of the cult once and for all.

A game by Aimilios Seimenis, Nicolas Joukowski & George Karsampas.
Music by Mike Macasiano (mikeHEARTu)
